format: html

```{r}
vec_1 <- c(2, 5, 9, 10, 8, 12, 1, 0)
```

```{r}
class(vec_1)

typeof(vec_1)

vec_1_e3 <- vec_1[3]

vec_1_e1 <- vec_1[1]

vec_1_e5to7 <- vec_1[5:7]
```


```{r}
vec_1_char <- as.character(vec_1)
```

```{r}
vec_2 <- c(town = "Santa Barbara",
           location = "Rincon",
           swell = "south")

class(vec_2)
```
```{r}
vec_2_e2 <- vec_2[2]
```

```{r}
df_1 <- data.frame(region = c("A", "B", "C", "D"),
                   species = c("otter", "great white", "sea lion", "gray whale"),
                   count = c(12, 2, 36, 6))

class(df_1)
class(df_1$species)
max_count <- max(df_1$count)
```
